# configurationUpdateHandler

**Instance Property**

A closure that executes when the button state changes.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var configurationUpdateHandler: UIButton.ConfigurationUpdateHandler? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Use this property as an alternative to overriding [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIButton/updateConfiguration()]. Set a closure to respond to button state changes by updating the button configuration.

In iOS 18 and later, UIKit supports automatic trait tracking inside this closure for traits from this button’s `traitCollection`. For more information, see [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/automatic-trait-tracking].

## Buttons

- **updateConfiguration()**: Updates the button configuration in response to a button state change.
